file_content.text: Greetings. I am Valis. Your quick response is most appreciated.
Please forgive the deception--Admiral Hacklin remains Darth Angral's faithful servant. His name simply made this meeting convenient.
He's a Sith. Kill him!
Now, really. Is that any way to treat your family?
Family? Kira, you know this man?
Explain yourselves.
Don't listen to him. He's trying to confuse you--us.
Put your weapon away, Kira. You know better.
Stand down, Padawan.
No, she really doesn't.
This won't have been a waste of time, if I get to kill you.
Prepare to die, Sith.
I thought Jedi were seekers of knowledge. Aren't you the least bit curious what this is about?
Your Padawan isn't who you think. She's no Jedi.
She's a Child of the Emperor, like me. And it's time she returned to our father's warm embrace.
Kira is my Padawan. If that were true, I'd know it.
You're lying.
Deception comes easily to our family. The dark side runs strong in us.
I've never heard of any "Emperor's Children." Who are you people?
Child of the Emperor?
The chosen ones--selected at birth to serve our father's great glory.
A distinction we should wear with pride. Don't deny your true lineage.
You've never been much of a Jedi. It figures you're a Sith.
I knew you were trouble, Kira.
I'm not a Sith. Don't let him turn you against me. We can defeat him--together.
We have no quarrel, Jedi. Return to your ship and let Kira come home. The Emperor wills it.
It doesn't matter where she came from--she's my Padawan.
No. She stays with me.
Tell our "father" not to expect any calls or letters.
The Emperor has no power here. I do.
Who cares what he wills?
Your self-delusions are irrelevant.
There's no escaping your destiny, Kira. Thanks to your little brush with Darth Angral, the Emperor knows you're alive--and where to find you.
No matter where you go, father sees you. He sees you right now... and he wants you back.
I'd rather die than see him again.
You betrayed me. Why shouldn't I let him have you?
Maybe I will just walk away.
I'm your Padawan. I've always been loyal to you.
Was loyalty what kept you from revealing your true origins? Even after Darth Angral recognized you on Ord Mantell?
Accept the truth, sister. You belong to the Emperor--and our father will have you back.
No. I'll die first.
So be it--sister.
Then I must kill you and your Master.
